name: RICHCODE富豪密码
description: 《Rich code》is a multiplayer online and simulation investment game.Pick careers randomly and invest as you work. The goal is to achieve financial freedom of more than 100% and win.In the game you can invest in today's business hotspots, negotiate with your opponents, trade, fight, etc., or buy and sell stocks.
minimum_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics:  Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card:  Additional Notes:
